name: @chakra-ui/c-code
description: Chakra UI Vue | Code is a component used to display inline code. It is composed from the Box component with a font family of mono for displaying code
author: Jonathan Bakebwa <codebender828@gmail.com>

scripts.build:esm: cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts,.tsx -d dist/esm --source-maps
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts,.tsx -d dist/cjs --source-maps
scripts.watch:esm: cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts,.tsx -d dist/esm --source-maps --watch
scripts.watch:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts,.tsx -d dist/cjs --source-maps --watch
